title: Welcome the new year with these Lunar Revel sales

replies.body:
Valentine's day of Legends

{{champion:69}} I've been poisoned by love and you're the only antidote
{{champion:103}} You don't need to press E to charm me
{{champion:84}} Matchmaking found true balance after it saw you
{{champion:81}} I needed a map after i got lost in your eyes
{{champion:27}} We've definitely got some chemistry together ;)
{{champion:40}} Did you fart cuz you blew me away
{{champion:89}} Did the sun rise or did you just smile
{{champion:127}} Your eyes will always melt my heart
{{champion:92}} What is broken always gets reforged when you're around
{{champion:17}} I have no soul

"I have no soul"

I think I just fell in love.
Ez finally admits he needs a map.
{{champion:103}} nood never land E, and also if you know what does that mean when you are still playing league while valentine's day{{item:3070}}
It means that you didn't fall into the trap of a holiday created by corporations to force men into spending more money or risk the wrath of women.
Dem pick up lines tho
{{champion:51}} You're definitely getting the bad cop tonight ;)
when you don't have someone to trade mystery chests with
That's why you make your mom create an account.{{champion:32}}
{{champion:39}} is my main man. {{champion:39}} is so good
First of all, your post doesn't have anything to do with the post up there. Second, IRELIA IS A FRIKKEN GIRL!
Just waiting for them to fix the price on the year of the goat pack... {{champion:26}}

I think the price is right--skins are 'full price,' and the ward skin and icon are discounted 99%. 975+975+975+6+2 = 2933. When Jinx increases the bundle ups the 375 RP increase. :-(
Suppose the idea is if you're planning on buying the 3 new skins you might as well get the other toys for 8 rp. :-/
that moment when you don't have the 8 extra rp and can't buy the bundle
Talk to support, sometimes they'll work something out
{{champion:154}} zac skin??? ice cream zac? molten zac? pool party zac? anything people?
{{champion:154}} Ice cream plz rito
Debonair Zac.

While we're on the subject of Lunar Revel skins, I had a pretty cool idea for a Yasuo/Zed skin.  It could be called Dishonored Samurai/Warrior (since they were both in some way disowned by their people) and they would have like Samurai/Warrior outfits (kinda flowy garb) with maybe a few scars and whatnot to make them look like war veterans.  I don't know, just my 2 cents :)
why not call them ronin skins then

{{champion:157}} would be Ronin whereas {{champion:238}} would probably be something else. He wasn't dishonored, he brought dishonored upon himself by using forbidden techniques to be his sensei's son{{champion:98}}
truuuue maybe {{champion:238}} could have like a shadow awaken skin where the evil aspect of his martial art over takes him and he becomes like an oni or something
THAT WOULD BE AWESOME

you mean he turns into {{champion:56}} 

because {{champion:56}} is {{champion:238}}
Why would they release Japanese themed skin for Chinese new years? LOL
I don't understand... which skin is Japanese themed?
Samurai are Japanese ^^

Because its actually a new year according to the LUNAR calendar, called the LUNAR NEW YEAR, but more commonly known as the Chinese new year. 

The Lunar new year is not celebrated just by China, but also in Korea and Japan. So people, Chinese new year is not China exclusive!
But regular {{champion:157}} is Dishonored Samurai...

I really want like a "pre-dishonored" Yasuo {{summoner:13}} skin if you catch my drift.

Kinda like how there is a prevoid kassadin
Was anybody else wishing the new Nidalee skin would turn into a tiger?
yessss firecracker jinx

... Just mentioning but you messed up the names of the bundles on the Lunar Reveal site. 2012 (most of it) was the year of the dragon and 2013 (same) was year of the snake.

I remember so clearly because at LR in 2014 i told a {{champion:69}}  with my {{champion:120}}  :"The year of the snake is OVER!"
Hehe no Kog'maw eh?{{champion:96}}
Well, 15k RP later...I own all the skins <3 yay. So much for a budget lol
i did the same thing XD, and broke my client :(

Although i really like the new skins and such, im kind of disappointed with the lack of actual goat related stuff.  I mean, we dont even get a banner or gong with the goat on it ;-;
I'm sorry, just being born on the year of the goat i was hoping for at least a ward heheh
So, {{champion:222}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:55}} skins will stay in store?

Not likely, most warring kingdoms skins are gone after about a month or so, and only come back when the new ones are released, after which they go away until the next package, at least that what it seems like.
It was [comfirmed](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/lunar-revel-2015.html) that they weren't legacy skins, so yes, they will stay in store!

"most warring kingdoms skins are gone after about a month or so"
The only WK skin that has been Legacy in the past is Tryndamere. J4 and Xin Zhao were both permanent additions to the shop. I'd hardly call that "most."

As for OP's question and this year's skins, the Lunar Revel FAQ says they will be staying in the store permanently.
Kog'Maw Pls

Does anyone know if the 'Lunar Revel Mystery Box' is the same thing as the current Mystery Box that is in the store? I can't find the 'Lunar Revel Mystery Box' particularly, so I'm curious as to whether the normal mystery boxes have just been fixed to have double the chance of awarding a Lunar Revel skin. I'm going to gift a friend for the icon, but I want to make sure I am buying the correct item.
Its the normal mystery box :)
so it might be just me or you cant buy the new skins anymore even tho its not the 23 yet o-o
Wait, is lion dance kogmaw not a lunar reveal skin?
im assuming the jinx and kat skins will be limited availability
They are going to stay in the store, they're not legacy.
Is Dragonblade Riven on sale on the 19th?
